text: aur mai to tumase ye nahin kahata ki mere paas khudaee khazaane hain aur na (ye kahata hoon ki) mai gaib vo hoon (gaib ka jaanane vaala) aur ye kahata hoon ki mai pharishta hoon aur jo log tumhaaree nazaron mein zaleel hain unhen mai ye nahin kahata ki khuda unake saath haragiz bhalaee nahin karega un logon ke dilon kee baat khuda hee khoob jaanata hai aur agar mai aisa kahoon to mai bhee yaqeenan zaalim hoon
